Hi, I'm Matteo "Teo" Ricci

Full Stack Developer & Web3 Innovator

I build modern web applications with Django, React, and Python. Currently developing educational platforms and exploring blockchain technologies on Polygon.

Let's build something →

About Me

I'm a passionate full stack developer based in Milan, Italy, with expertise in building scalable web applications and exploring cutting-edge technologies. My journey spans from traditional web development to Web3 innovations.


Currently, I'm developing SchoolPlatform, an innovative educational Web3 platform that combines modern learning techniques with blockchain technology. When I'm not coding, I write about mindfulness, technology, and continuous learning on my blog.
